markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Limited">
[Incendiary Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=1102)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 77

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
see below

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You summon a cloud of flammable black dust. The cloud functions as [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210). If any open flame or [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) effect is within the spell's area when it's cast, or later enters or occurs within the area, the cloud ignites. Creatures in the cloud take 10d6 fire damage ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save), and the spell ends.
name: Incendiary Fog

summary: You summon a cloud of flammable black dust.
summary_markdown: You summon a cloud of flammable black dust.
text: Incendiary Fog Three Actions May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame Source Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra pg. 77 Traditions Arcane, Primal Cast material, somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 20-foot burst Saving Throw see below Duration 1 minute --- You summon a cloud of flammable black dust. The cloud functions as obscuring mist . If any open flame or fire effect is within the spell's area when it's cast, or later enters or occurs within the area, the cloud ignites. Creatures in the cloud take 10d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save), and the spell ends.
